description: Test your advanced Python skills with this 86-minute quiz. Apply your knowledge of data structures, file operations, and object-oriented programming to solve real-world problems.

assessment.purpose: Demonstrate your proficiency in Python by completing this challenging quiz, designed to assess your ability to write efficient and effective code.

generated_text:
**Module 31: Python**
**Duration: 86 minutes**
Test your advanced Python skills with this 86-minute quiz. Apply your knowledge of data structures, file operations, and object-oriented programming to solve real-world problems. Questions will cover topics such as:
- List comprehensions
- Lambda functions
- Error handling
- Module imports
Demonstrate your proficiency in Python by completing this challenging quiz, designed to assess your ability to write efficient and effective code.
